name: Parasomnia (Steven Hancher, schonstal)
description:
A labyrinthian hospital filled with nightmarish creatures has our protagonist trapped in a cycle she can't seem to break. Using her wits, she must scrape together every last resource she can find, and make it to the bottom of this fever dream. Will she find the answers she is looking for in the bowels of this maze, or just more questions. 

Keyboard / Gamepad Controls: 

WASD/Left Joystick: Move

R/Right Face Button: Reload

Hold Left Mouse Click/Hold Right Bumper: Aim and Fire

Hold Right Mouse Click/Hold Left Face button: Heal

Made for Summer Slow Jams.
